doc.after: Charlotte has historically been a Protestant city It is the birthplace of Billy Graham and is also the historic seat of Southern Presbyterianism but the changing demographics of the city s increasing population have brought scores of new denominations and faiths The Billy Graham Evangelistic Association Wycliffe Bible Translators JAARS Center and SIM Missions Organization make their homes in the Charlotte general area In total Charlotte proper has 700 places of worship
